metadata.name: Rovamycine 250 Capsule 750000 Unit 1 5 miu Injection powder for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Macrolide antibiotic for treatment of various infections

contraindications.disease: Cardiac toxicity specifically QT prolongation irregular heartbeat recurrent fainting Cholestatic hepatitis abdominal pain nausea vomiting yellow eyes or skin Gastrointestinal toxicity specifically acute colitis abdominal pain and tenderness bloody stools fever Intestinal injury abdominal pain and tenderness Ulcerated esophagitis chest pain heartburn
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: The absolute bioavailability of oral spiramycin is generally within the range of 30 to 40 After a 1 g oral dose the maximum serum drug concentration was found to be within the range 0 4 to 1 4 mg L

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Terfenadine can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Telaprevir can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The therapeutic efficacy of Picosulfuric acid can be decreased when used in combination with Spiramycin
The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Spiramycin
The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Spiramycin
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Atorvastatin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Dicoumarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Phenindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Coumarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Tioclomarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Warfarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Phenprocoumon
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Acenocoumarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with 4 hydroxycoumarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with R warfarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Ethyl biscoumacetate
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Fluindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Clorindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with Diphenadione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Spiramycin is combined with S Warfarin
The serum concentration of Digoxin can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The therapeutic efficacy of Lactulose can be decreased when used in combination with Spiramycin
Triamcinolone may decrease the excretion rate of Spiramycin which could result in a higher serum level
The serum concentration of Flunisolide can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Betamethasone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Prednisone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Fludrocortisone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Hydrocortisone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Prednisolone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Methylprednisolone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Trilostane can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Budesonide can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Dexamethasone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Corticotropin can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Cortisone acetate can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Paramethasone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Aldosterone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Fluprednisolone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Meprednisone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Melengestrol can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Deflazacort can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Cortivazol can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Prednylidene can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Cloprednol can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The serum concentration of Cortisone can be increased when it is combined with Spiramycin
The therapeutic efficacy of Vibrio cholerae CVD 103 HgR strain live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Spiramycin
